data.output: Once upon a time, there were three sentient cars, called Petrol, Diesel and Pump. Petrol was a red sporty car who loved to drive fast. Diesel was older, brown and reliable. Pump was a small silver car. They loved to drive around together and have adventures. However, Petrol was always getting cross at Diesel and Pump for not being able to drive as fast as he could. They decided to teach him a lesson. One day, they drove and drove and drove for as long as they could. Petrol felt himself running out of fuel and begged them to stop and wait. They carried on and left him behind at the side of the road. After a little while, they returned and found him feeling very sorry for himself. "See?" they told him, "we may be older and smaller, but we are still good, st and reliable

Lucy threw the letter on the ground. She was not going to read another word of this rubbish. She stamped on the envelope and screwed her heel into the paper, ripping it. How satisfying, she thought, that'll teach him to send me such dross. She walked out of the room with her head held high, smiling at the feeling of release and closure.

Jason played his organ loudly, entertaining the higher-ups of the empire. He had been asked to play at the society wedding, and had strict instructions to play only romantic and beautiful songs. However, he was a member of the secret society and had a plan. He started to play a stirring, uplifting song which did not comply with his orders, and the society rushed in through the open doors, ready to attack.
She looked out of the window at the gloom. The man entered through the heavy oak door. "Here is your payment", he mumbled. The woman spoke quietly. "Excellent, you may continue to exist."
